agenda.description: ** REVISION ** SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Nominations TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM Thursday, March 21, 2019 PLACE: 2E.20 (Betty King Cmte. Rm.) CHAIR: Senator Dawn Buckingham __________________________________________________________________________________ To consider the following: Pending business: Finance Commission of Texas, Pending business from the Thursday, March 14, 2019, meeting, as well as, the posted agenda. The following nominees will appear: Commissioner of Education Michael Hunter Morath Appointed 02-27-19 for a Watson Travis County term to expire 01-16-23 Board of the Texas Department of Motor Vehicles Paul Richard Scott Appointed 07-30-18 for a Perry Lubbock County term to expire 02-01-23 Texas Transportation Commission Wylie New Appointed 02-20-18 for a Perry Tom Green County term to expire 02-01-21 Parks and Wildlife Commission Richard Randal Scott Appointed 11-15-18 for a Campbell Hays County term to expire 02-01-23 Sulphur River Basin Authority Board of Directors James Christopher Spencer Appointed 02-06-18 for a Hughes Cass County term to expire 02-01-23 State Board of Veterinary Medical Examiners Carlos R. Chacon Appointed 10-02-17 for a Campbell Travis County term to expire 08-26-23 Michael Andrew White Appointed 10-02-17 for a Creighton Montgomery County term to expire 08-26-19 Red River Authority of Texas Board of Directors Michael Ray Sandefur Appointed 07-26-18 for a Hughes Bowie County term to expire 08-11-23 Zackary Kiser Smith Appointed 11-14-18 for a Seliger Randall County term to expire 08-11-19 Joe Larry Ward Appointed 07-26-18 for a Hall Fannin County term to expire 08-11-23 The following nominees will not appear: Midwestern State University Board of Regents Okechukwu Okeke
